statements.select: select b.ID as id, b.ISBN as isbn, b.NAME as name ,a.id as "author.id" ,a.name as "author.name", 'HARD' as "author.printTypePref" from BOOK b inner join AUTHOR a on a.ID = b.AUTHOR_ID order by a.name
